title: A Tour of My YouTube Studio Setup (2023)
description:
One of the most often requested videos is the "YouTube studio tour."  Because of the requests, and because I'm constantly getting new equipment, it's a good idea to do an updated studio tour every few months, where I discuss the equipment that I use to make my video content.  

CAMERA EQUIPMENT:
► https://amzn.to/3jJyHI1 - Panasonic Lumix G7 Mirrorless Camera
► https://amzn.to/3HUeLOi - Panasonic G9
► https://amzn.to/3rkdb1g - 14mm Lens for Panasonic Cameras
► https://amzn.to/3nEoOhh - 25mm Lens for Panasonic Cameras
► https://amzn.to/3I1fYmX - Logitech C922 Webcam
► https://amzn.to/3I03Ouw - Elgato Cam Link
► https://amzn.to/3tp8J48 - Magewell Capture Card

AUDIO EQUIPMENT:
► https://amzn.to/3iJ2v67 - Electro-Voice 27 N/D microphone
► https://amzn.to/3jIT87H - Mount for EV 27 N/D
► https://amzn.to/3I2tarQ - Blue Baby Bottle SL
► https://amzn.to/3I38bFf - Sennheiser MKE 600
► https://amzn.to/30PPpOy - Rode PSA1 Swivel Arm
► https://amzn.to/34GR2z9 - Audio Technica ATH1000X headphones
